General.Name: Ningbo Color Master Batch Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ningbo Color Master Batch Co., Ltd. produces and sells plastic colors in China and internationally. The company offers color, black, white, and functional masterbatch products under the MINGZHOU brand. It serves domestic and foreign enterprises in the home appliances, food packaging, cosmetics, daily necessities, building materials, automobiles, and other industries. The company's product is used in high-end appliances, food grade packaging, solar photovoltaic, and electronic communication applications. Ningbo Color Master Batch Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 168, Jinhui West Road, Ningbo, China, 315105
